issue.message: Attribute `usesCleartextTraffic` is only used in API level 23 and higher (current min is 21)

The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and higher and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures cloud backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.
The resource `R.integer.react_native_dev_server_port` appears to be unused
The resource `R.integer.react_native_inspector_proxy_port` appears to be unused
The resource `R.mipmap.ic_launcher_foreground` appears to be unused
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icon used as round icon did not have a circular shape
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
